import '../App.css' import {useRef, useState} from 'react' import store from '../Redux/store' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' export default ()=>{ let [trans, settrans] = useState([]) const adddata = (datas)=>{ settrans(datas) store.dispatch({ type: 'ADD_DATA', payload: datas }) } let {register, handleSubmit, formState:{errors}} = useForm() return

ADD NEW TRANSACTION

{errors.text &&
Please Enter Some Text
}
{errors.amount &&
Please Enter Some Amount
}
}
